Detailed Description

A class for the parsing of command line arguments.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

fsdict::Getopt::Getopt (  )  [inline]

A standard constructor.

fsdict::Getopt::Getopt ( size_t  argc,
char const **  argv 
) [inline]

This constructor also carries out the command line parsing.

No detailed specification of flags is possible here.

This is mainly for backwards compatibility.
